summary:
This mod adds a new armor set, wich is a retexture of the ebony armor.
(Neck-Fix included)
descriptionHtml:
[center]First of all, i want to excuse me for my bad english. I'm not a native speaker, so please understand.

[b][size=+2]©««««© Presentation ©««««©[/size][/b]

Thanks to [URL=http://www.youtube.com/user/nozi87]Nozi87[/URL]

[youtube]XUiwtcDcZhE[/youtube]


[b][size=+2]©««««© General ©««««©[/size][/b]

This mods adds a NEW armor set to Skyrim, wich includes to variants (see Screenshots) of the retextured version of the vanilla ebony armor. The mod does NOT replace the vanilla one, it will add two new craftable set under the ebony category at any forge.
It supports armor and shield for both genders, male and female.
The variants can be used together or alone.

[b][size=+2]©««««© Compatibility ©««««©[/size][/b]

This mod should be compatible with ANY other mod, because it adds his own meshes and textures.


[b][size=+2]©««««© Installation ©««««©[/size][/b]

Download this file with NMM, activate it, reday!
When you are using both variants and the NMM ask, if he should overwrite existing files, answer with "Yes to all".

This mod is also available on Steam-Workshop:
[URL=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=225861722&searchtext=](1) Silver-Orange Version[/URL]
[URL=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=228356077](2) Golden-Green Version[/URL]


[b][size=+2]©««««© Used Mods ©««««©[/size][/b]

Thanks for feanbeast, who is author of the mod:
(1) [URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4428/?]Ebony Armor Male Neck Fix by feanbeast[/URL]


[b][size=+2]©««««© Plans for the future ©««««©[/size][/b]

My next project will be to create a matching weapon set and depending on the success of these mod, different color options or a HD-variant. So please endorse and share the mod, if you enjoyed it, to increase the speed of development.
[/center]
author: GeniusST97
